metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a brain-washed follower of Cazador.She is cleaning walls / objects in one of the hallways.NOTE Please rename Servant_003 to Varderola.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Act 3 Lower City - Cazador's Palace - KennelClick on the servant.

0.speaker: Varderola
0.text: The master is dead. Dead. I feel lost. Who am I if master is dead?

1.speaker: Varderola
1.text: The master is pure. His palace must be pure. No stain. No smudge. No taint. Pure.

2.speaker: Varderola
2.text: Have you heard? There is a new master. He is beautiful but harsh, as we deserve.

3.speaker: Varderola
3.text: I scrub for the master. As you see. Tell the master I scrub for him. Always.
